name: Yaswanth Kummetha
bio: Associate Lead Data Scientist with 6+ years of experience in Data Science, Data Engineering and Analytics. Google certified TensorFlow Developer with expertise in ML, DL, NLP and building interactive applications. Graduate from IIT Kanpur.

projects.title: All Things ML
projects.description: Comprehensive machine learning platform featuring interactive tools for ML, Deep Learning, and NLP tasks. Includes classification, regression, clustering algorithms with visual demonstrations and hands-on learning experiences.

projects.title: Swara - Speech Processing App
projects.description: Multilingual speech-to-text and text-to-speech web application built with Flask. Supports real-time voice transcription and natural speech synthesis in multiple languages including English, Telugu, Arabic, and Spanish.
